report.title: Get record data per square per year
report.description: List record data per square per year. Used to give users a simple overview of data which might relate to notifications they have received.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM locations square LEFT JOIN locations_websites lw on lw.location_id=square.id AND lw.deleted=false JOIN locations plot on plot.parent_id=square.id AND plot.deleted=false JOIN samples s on s.location_id = plot.id and s.created_by_id = #current_user_id# AND s.deleted=false AND s.training = false JOIN occurrences o on o.sample_id = s.id AND o.deleted=false AND o.training = false WHERE (square.location_type_id=#core_square_location_type_id#) AND ((trim('#year#') = '' OR s.date_start >= CAST(COALESCE('#year#' || '-01-01','1500-01-01') as date)) AND (trim('#year#') = '' OR s.date_start <= CAST(COALESCE('#year#' || '-12-31','1500-01-01') as date))) AND #website_filter# AND square.deleted=false #filters#

param.name: year
param.description: Select a year, or leave blank for all years

param.name: current_user_id
param.display: Id of the currently logged in user

param.name: ignore_dates_before
param.description: Ignore samples whose date is before this date (we can ignore transition years data).

column.name: untouched
column.sql: COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN o.record_status = 'C' OR o.record_status = 'I' THEN o.id END)

column.name: verified
column.sql: COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN o.record_status = 'V' THEN o.id END) || ' (' || COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN o.record_status = 'V' AND (o.record_decision_source != 'M' OR o.record_decision_source IS NULL) THEN o.id END) || ' human, ' || COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN o.record_status = 'V' AND o.record_decision_source = 'M' THEN o.id END) || ' machine)'
